body: @ianlancetaylor lovely work! Would it be helpful for me to mail any of the odder NodeList related fixes, such as https://github.com/josharian/go/commit/497ed0cd1f659fb01e2cb3cb8e4ce962c8edbd22 or https://github.com/josharian/go/commit/af8d72fa169c1c7d07a8a447bd40cf8bb9a45b1f, or can I assume you've seen them all and have it all under control?
